validationErrors.message: Field "testCases": Test case 1: Expected output should be in stdout format, not data structure format
Field "testCases": Test case 2: Expected output should be in stdout format, not data structure format

originalDocument.title: Sort Array Based on Another Array
originalDocument.content:
You are given two arrays, arr1 and arr2, where the elements of arr2 are unique and all appear in arr1.

Reorder the elements of arr1 such that their relative order matches that of arr2. Any elements in arr1 that do not appear in arr2 should be sorted at the end of arr1 in ascending order.

testCases.description: Elements of arr1 are rearranged to follow the order given by arr2. Remaining elements (7, 19) are sorted in ascending order.
The order of arr2 is preserved in arr1, with the remaining elements (17, 44) sorted in ascending order.

originalDocument.outputFormat: List representation of the sorted array
